scripts.pack-client-libs: lerna run prepublishOnly && lerna exec --scope @cuba-platform/re* 'npm pack -q'
scripts.react-all: npm run bootstrap-react-app && npm run bootstrap-cuba-app && npm run start-cuba-app && npm run start-react-app
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: echo 'RUNNING UNIT TESTS...' && lerna run test --scope @cuba-platform/react && lerna run coverage --scope {@cuba-platform/rest,@cuba-platform/front-generator}
scripts.test:integration: echo 'RUNNING INTEGRATION TESTS...' && lerna run test:e2e --scope @cuba-platform/front-generator
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'RUNNING E2E TESTS...' && npm run test-pup
scripts.docs: npm run docs:api-reference && npm run docs:toc
